scripts.dev:infra: docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml up -d db embedder
scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:infra && npm run dev
scripts.dev:smokeTest:
echo '--- DB row count ---' && docker exec -it remote-job-radar-db-1 psql -U postgres -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jobs;" && echo '
--- Aggregator health ---' && (curl -s http://localhost:8080/health || echo 'Aggregator not running') && echo '
--- GraphQL query ---' && (curl -s -X POST http://localhost:4000/graphql -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"query":"{ jobs(minFit:0, first:3){ id title company fitScore } }"}' | jq || echo 'GraphQL not reachable') && echo '
--- Web app HEAD ---' && (curl -I -s http://localhost:3000 | head -n 1 || echo 'Web not reachable')
